name: Cat Colony Crisis
description:
You are tasked with helping a colony ship full of space-faring cats deal with a mysterious disease outbreak! Watch for symptoms such as sneezing, headaches, sweating and more but beware some symptoms may be the result of pre-existing conditions. As the cats go about their personal business try and find the sick, use testing and contact tracing to confirm your suspicions and isolate the sick to prevent the spread.



Will you act fast and stop the spread of this disease or will it spread unchecked and ravage your Cat Colony.



Cat Colony Crisis is a colony management game where you must observe your cats and try to stop them spreading contagious disease.
Features:
- Cat AI, they love, fight, eat, sleep according to their personality
- Multiple difficulty levels, ramp up the difficulty as your increase your skills
- Global leader-boards, compare you skill with the rest of the world
- Cute hand draw art style
- Lot and lots of cute cats
